title: How to Peel and Cut Elephant Foot

steps.headline: Place the elephant foot on the chopping board.
Make a slit on one side of the it with a knife.
Cut along the slit till the end of the yam.
Repeat the above steps till the entire yam is cut into pieces.
Pick up one of them.
Peel the outer brown layer of it.This must be a thin layer.
Cut the pale brown colored part of it.
Cut the brown colored portion from the sides also.
Place all the pieces in a colander.
Wash them under the running water.
Place one piece on the chopping board.
Cut one inch long pieces in length.
Repeat the above step till the entire piece is cut.
Turn them around and cut half inch piece.
Repeat the above step.
Cut slices in case if each piece is thick still.
Cut lengthwise pieces.
Cut small pieces from it now.
Collect them together.
Cut from the middle.
Repeat the above step once again.

text: Place the elephant foot on the chopping board.  Make a slit on one side of the it with a knife.  Cut along the slit till the end of the yam.  Repeat the above steps till the entire yam is cut into pieces.  Pick up one of them.  Peel the outer brown layer of it.This must be a thin layer.  Cut the pale brown colored part of it.  Cut the brown colored portion from the sides also.  Place all the pieces in a colander.  Wash them under the running water.  Place one piece on the chopping board.  Cut one inch long pieces in length.  Repeat the above step till the entire piece is cut.  Turn them around and cut half inch piece.  Repeat the above step.  Cut slices in case if each piece is thick still.  Cut lengthwise pieces.  Cut small pieces from it now.  Collect them together.  Cut from the middle.  Repeat the above step once again.
